reviews.review: Esse jogo dá trauma, principalmente o pé de cabra, lembra o dia em que meu pai chegou bêbado e sentou a paulada na minha cabeça até ficar igual a do Rica.
Un juego que te trae muchos buenos recuerdos cada vez que lo jugaba, un gran clasico inolvidable

Voy por la mitad del videojuego, solo tengo para decir algo, PRECIOSO!, un juego expectacular, ni bien es viejo, sus graficas son muy buenas, te puede correr tranquilamente, tengo un i5 3210m de 2ga gen, y una intel hd 4000, y lo puedo correr al palo, hdr, texturas muy altas, sombras altas, y todo alto, lo unico que no tengo alto es el antialiasing y el filtro de texturas, lo demas, a full, y lo puedo jugar a 70-100 fps, epicardooo!!!, compreenlooo!! NO SE VAN A ARREPENTIR!!.
Very compelling and engaging single player experience
it gave me a static square after i played it
Fun time all around. Still looks pretty good even today
there is nothing i have loved more than anything

Valve, пожалуйста, забейте болт на эти мультиплеерные проекты. Вы умеете(по крайне мере умели) делать axyeнные игры.Так продолжайте.Где Half-Life 3, Portal 3, Left 4 Dead 3?На этих сериях вы бы срубили доxyя бабла+игрокам бы нравилось.А сейчас в Valve сидят бизнесмены, а не разрабы. -_-
Что же касается обзора на саму игру...То тут мне нечего сказать.Если вы не знаете/не играли в хл2 то вы либо Нагибатор2008 играющий в фортнайт, либо вас чурки избили и вы потеряли память, либо вы далеки от игр. 
Однозначно 9/10.Для того времени эта игра просто нечто.
pretty cool and fun and stuff

AMAZING, I have not stopped revisiting this game ever since i bought it, and I am still discovering new things. If you want to get into the half life franchise, please start with the original half life first. It is equally as great as this one! I can't say anything else in this review due to spoilers, this game MUST be experienced to enjoy it, rather than just some explanation on the internet. HAVE FUN!

It's just kinda one of those games that everyone should own on steam.
It also took me 6 years to actually complete it lol.

Lots of fun! The gameplay is amazing and the graphics are extraordinary! Definitely a leg up on the original Half-Life, but there needs to be more explanation into why the Earth was taken over by the aliens early off in the game.

A game as good as the hype.

I recently purchased the game, having missed the series at its debut, to learn a bit about the story before the VR title is released. So far the game does not disappoint. The game is very old school--no minimap, no clues--just you, your wit, and an endless supply of headcrabs and combines. 

The game is dated (obviously) but not so much that it isn't playable. 

Had a blast!
Gifting these to friends these masterpieces. Best 15 hours I ever spent.
This game will never get old. Truly Masterpiece. Hope, i'll see the day, when the story will be continued (not ALYX)

El mejor juego con las mejores físicas que he conocido desde que era un pequeño, desde que salió éste juego, no he perdido ese amor que me hace jugar cada hora/día más. Una historia que hasta la actualidad no se concluye, pero no deja de ser tan exquisita, de todas maneras no se pierde la fe en disfrutar la culminación de la franquicia. Totalmente recomendado el juego, personajes con quienes enlazas una relación única, enemigos bien desarrollados, físicas que en su época sonaban difíciles de desarrollar y bueno... Cosas que más quisiera escribir. 
Gracias Valve por hacernos disfrutar con tu arte

Amazing Game and overall Amazing series. This is my favorite fucking game and you should play the entire half life series if you haven't I've been a fan of this game for multiple years now and I really hope more games come out.
A classic. And one of the best games of all time.
it's fucking half life OF COURSE IT'S GOOD
I have murdered more combine than I have drank gallons of delicious 100 percent fat milk which is saying something
Does that type of greatness need review
Such a freaking classic i luv it
Um bom jogo mesmo sendo de 2004.

After recently finishing the game for the first time, I am able to see what all the hype was about. The graphics are impressive for 2004 standards and the controls paired with the physics are buttery smooth.
Самая лучша игра 2004 года но для меня это игра всегда будет номер один !!! сколько прошло лет но я всеровно до сих пор играю и проходил эту игру множество раз но она до сих пор не надоела

Отличная игра сделавшая прорыв в игровой индустрии!Решил её купить после прохождения на пиратке.
Плюсы
+Проработанная физика
+Хорошая графика по меркам 2004г
+Хороший сюжет
+Хорошая озвучка
Минусы
Пока что я их не заметил
Очень рекомендую к покупке и прохождению этой хоть и старой,но очень хорошей игры
A historical relic, never to have its true ending
chapter 11 makes me want to kill myself
Ce jeu est un excellent jeux je vous le conseil

One of the greatest series! I have played again after 12 years , I wasn't remembering much of it, it was awesome as the first time! Much ahead of it's time, superb story, great graphics, come on Valve, release episode 3 or and Half Life 3!!!!!
10/10 Todo es perfecto en este juego, me atrapo totalmente.
I really enjoyed the game. I havent played the first game but i still got really involved with the story.
Na pewno jedna z najlepszych gier w historii. Mógłbym nawet stwierdzić że to jest lepsze od oryginału! Grafika oraz rozgrywka nie zestarzały się nawet o chwilę. Atmosfera powala z nóg.
Este juego lo jugué cuando tenia 7 años (Ahora tengo 15) y marco mi infancia, no tengo nada mas que decir.
One of the greatest games of all time. A mix of an amazing story and solid gameplay makes this a really fun time to play. Still hasn't been topped when it comes to best fps out there.
el mejor juego del mundo de lejos
I love how it's linear but I still feel like I have a choice, great game, can't wait for Alyx!
Лучшая игра. Графон на 2004 год просмото пушка, а озвучка только чего стоит.
Классика пацаны, вы че, конечно топ.
grafikleri fena deği eğlenceli ilk bölümleri efso sonra boka sarıyor
mt legal passa o tempo e te deixa vc interessado pelo proximo capitulo
В рот - воняет, в жо пу - больно, с Half-Life 2 - прикольно, но всё же смазка понадобится(решейд)

i just love it!

frankly its a masterpiece and if you haven't played it, then you are an uncultured swine.
